statements: SELECT id, timestamp, location, vehicle_type, speed, congestion_level FROM TrafficData;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type = 'car' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 3 AND speed < 40 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE location LIKE '%highway%' AND congestion_level = 2;
SELECT id, location, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60 AND congestion_level > 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%' AND congestion_level <= 4 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, vehicle_type FROM TrafficData WHERE speed BETWEEN 40 AND 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, location, speed, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE speed >= 50 AND congestion_level <= 3 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location='Highway A'
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM traffic_data ORDER BY speed DESC
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level >= 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level < 2
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_vehicles FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 30 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;

SELECT timestamp, location, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels INNER JOIN traffic_data ON congestion_levels.timestamp = traffic_data.timestamp AND congestion_levels.location = traffic_data.location ORDER BY congestion_level DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM congestion_history WHERE congestion_index > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, date, analysis_result FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, location, vehicle_type, speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, congestion_index, date FROM congestion_history WHERE congestion_index > 5 AND location LIKE 'City%' ORDER BY congestion_index ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE location = 'Highway 1' AND congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY date DESC, analysis_result ASC;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS avg_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_analysis GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT id, congestion_level FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY congestion_level ASC;
SELECT report_id, timestamp, congestion_level FROM traffic_reports WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_reports WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT area_id, AVG(congestion_level) AS avg_congestion FROM congestion_data GROUP BY area_id HAVING AVG(congestion_level) > 2;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT location, date, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 2;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicles WHERE type = 'SUV';
SELECT location, active FROM traffic_cameras WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 2
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE date = '2021-07-15' ORDER BY congestion_level DESC
SELECT location, date, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level < 3 AND location LIKE '%highway%'
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE date = '2021-08-20' AND description LIKE '%accident%'
SELECT t.location, v.make, v.model FROM traffic_patterns t JOIN vehicles v ON t.location = CONCAT(v.make, ' ', v.model)
